description: Learn how to get the most from your outdoor photography with landscape filters and take your images to the next level. Featuring outdoor & active lifestyle photographer Adam Barker, “Completing Your Outdoor Photography” introduces the most useful filters for landscape and nature photography. Adam captures the scene in front of him as the human eye sees it, allowing him to create what he describes as “the complete image”. The program features an in-depth look at graduated neutral density filters, polarizing filters, warming polarizers, color intensifiers, variable neutral density filters, and the vari-n-duo filter from Singh-Ray.
title: Completing Your Outdoor Photography with Landscape Filters
